org.jtrim.image

Class ImageMetaData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jtrim.image.ImageMetaData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavaIIOMetaData

    public class ImageMetaData
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a base class for the meta data of an image. The meta data must at least contain the dimensions of the image and if the image is a complete or partial image.

    Thread safety

    Methods of this class can be safely accessed by multiple threads. The methods of the subclasses of this class must be safe to be accessed concurrently as well. ImageMetaData instances are immutable and subclasses should be implemented to be immutable as well.

    Synchronization transparency

    The methods of this class are synchronization transparent and the subclasses of this class must be synchronization transparent as well.
    See Also:
    ImageData

      ImageMetaData(int width, int height, boolean complete)
      Initializes the ImageMetaData with the specified properties.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getHeight()
      Returns the height in number of pixels whose meta data is this ImageMetaData.
      int getWidth()
      Returns the width in number of pixels whose meta data is this ImageMetaData.
      boolean isComplete()
      Returns true if the image whose meta data is this ImageMetaData is completely available.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageMetaData

        public ImageMetaData(int width,
             int height,
             boolean complete)
        Initializes the ImageMetaData with the specified properties.
        Parameters:
        width - the width in number of pixels of the image whose meta data is the newly created ImageMetaData. This argument must be greater than or equal to zero.
        height - the height in number of pixels of the image whose meta data is the newly created ImageMetaData. This argument must be greater than or equal to zero.
        complete - a boolean indicating if the image whose meta data is the newly created ImageMetaData is a complete or partial image. If this argument is true, the image is completely loaded. If false, the image is only partially available.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the width or height argument is illegal

    • Method Detail

      • isComplete

        public final boolean isComplete()
        Returns true if the image whose meta data is this ImageMetaData is completely available.
        Returns:
        true if the image whose meta data is this ImageMetaData is completely available, false if the image is only partially available

      • getHeight

        public final int getHeight()
        Returns the height in number of pixels whose meta data is this ImageMetaData.
        Returns:
        the height in number of pixels whose meta data is this ImageMetaData. This method always returns an integer greater tan or equal to zero.

      • getWidth

        public final int getWidth()
        Returns the width in number of pixels whose meta data is this ImageMetaData.
        Returns:
        the width in number of pixels whose meta data is this ImageMetaData. This method always returns an integer greater tan or equal to zero.
